data.text/markdown: Ontonaut Code Editor Examples
Example 1: Basic Python Executor
Example 2: Custom Math Language
Example 3: JSON Formatter
Example 4: Custom DSL - Todo Commands

Creating Your Own Executor

Simply define a function that takes a code string and returns a result: 
def my_executor(code: str) -> Any:
    # Your custom logic here
    # Parse the code, execute it, return results
    return result

editor = CodeEditor(
    code="your code here",
    language="mylang",
    executor=my_executor
)

data.text/html: <marimo-ui-element object-id='bkHC-0' random-id='d0d0b928-fd85-881d-5229-59eff61c7eaa'><marimo-anywidget data-initial-value='{"code":"# Calculate factorial\nn = 5\nresult = 1\nfor i in range(1, n + 1):\n    result *= i\nresult","error":"","language":"python","line_numbers":true,"output":"","placeholder":"Enter code here...","read_only":false,"theme":"light"}' data-label='null' data-js-url='"./@file/5245-4828516-KyZSnnZ4.js"' data-js-hash='"27d46411a40af37011da64da11816d1e"' data-css='"/**\n * Ontonaut Code Editor Styles\n * Clean, modern styling inspired by marimo's aesthetic\n */\n\n.ontonaut-container {\n  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", Roboto, \"Helvetica Neue\", Arial, sans-serif;\n  border: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  border-radius: 6px;\n  overflow: hidden;\n  background: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.04);\n  margin: 8px 0;\n  transition: box-shadow 0.2s ease;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container:hover {\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  border-color: #333333;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n/* Toolbar */\n.ontonaut-toolbar {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 8px;\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-toolbar {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-language {\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  padding: 2px 6px;\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n  border-radius: 3px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-language {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button,\n.ontonaut-clear-button {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 4px;\n  padding: 4px 10px;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  border: none;\n  border-radius: 4px;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: all 0.15s ease;\n  background: #10b981;\n  color: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button:hover {\n  background: #059669;\n  transform: translateY(-0.5px);\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.25);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button:active {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button {\n  background: white;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button {\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #f9fafb;\n  border-color: #d1d5db;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #2a2a2a;\n  border-color: #404040;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button:active {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button:active {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button svg {\n  width: 12px;\n  height: 12px;\n}\n\n/* Editor Section */\n.ontonaut-editor-section {\n  display: flex;\n  position: relative;\n  min-height: 150px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-line-numbers {\n  padding: 12px 8px;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-right: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  user-select: none;\n  min-width: 36px;\n  text-align: right;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-line-numbers {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-right-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.line-number {\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 11px;\n  line-height: 20px;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .line-number {\n  color: #6b7280;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor {\n  position: relative;\n  flex: 1;\n  padding: 12px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 13px;\n  line-height: 20px;\n  border: none;\n  outline: none;\n  resize: vertical;\n  min-height: 150px;\n  background: white;\n  color: #24292e;\n  caret-color: #10b981;\n  tab-size: 4;\n  z-index: 2;\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-editor {\n  background: #1e1e1e;\n  color: #d4d4d4;\n  caret-color: #10b981;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor:focus {\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-editor:focus {\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n/* Selection styling */\n.ontonaut-editor::selection {\n  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor::-moz-selection {\n  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor::placeholder {\n  color: #6a737d;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n\n/* Output Section */\n.ontonaut-output-section {\n  border-top: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output-section {\n  border-top-color: #333333;\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-output-label {\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output-label {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-output,\n.ontonaut-error {\n  margin: 0;\n  padding: 10px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  line-height: 18px;\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n  background: white;\n  color: #1f2937;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-error {\n  color: #dc2626;\n  background: #fef2f2;\n  border-left: 2px solid #dc2626;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-error {\n  color: #f87171;\n  background: #2a1a1a;\n  border-left-color: #f87171;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-error:empty {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n/* Responsive */\n@media (max-width: 768px) {\n  .ontonaut-toolbar {\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n  }\n\n  .ontonaut-editor {\n    font-size: 12px;\n  }\n}\n"' data-buffer-paths='[]'></marimo-anywidget></marimo-ui-element>

2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  border-color: #333333;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n/* Toolbar */\n.ontonaut-toolbar {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 8px;\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-toolbar {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-language {\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  padding: 2px 6px;\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n  border-radius: 3px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-language {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button,\n.ontonaut-clear-button {\n  display: flex;\n  align-items: center;\n  gap: 4px;\n  padding: 4px 10px;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  border: none;\n  border-radius: 4px;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: all 0.15s ease;\n  background: #10b981;\n  color: white;\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button:hover {\n  background: #059669;\n  transform: translateY(-0.5px);\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.25);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button:active {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  box-shadow: 0 1px 2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button {\n  background: white;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  border: 1px solid #e5e7eb;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button {\n  background: #1f1f1f;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #f9fafb;\n  border-color: #d1d5db;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button:hover {\n  background: #2a2a2a;\n  border-color: #404040;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-clear-button:active {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n  background: #f3f4f6;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-clear-button:active {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-run-button svg {\n  width: 12px;\n  height: 12px;\n}\n\n/* Editor Section */\n.ontonaut-editor-section {\n  display: flex;\n  position: relative;\n  min-height: 150px;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-line-numbers {\n  padding: 12px 8px;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n  border-right: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  user-select: none;\n  min-width: 36px;\n  text-align: right;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-line-numbers {\n  background: #252525;\n  border-right-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.line-number {\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 11px;\n  line-height: 20px;\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  font-variant-numeric: tabular-nums;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .line-number {\n  color: #6b7280;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor {\n  position: relative;\n  flex: 1;\n  padding: 12px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 13px;\n  line-height: 20px;\n  border: none;\n  outline: none;\n  resize: vertical;\n  min-height: 150px;\n  background: white;\n  color: #24292e;\n  caret-color: #10b981;\n  tab-size: 4;\n  z-index: 2;\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-editor {\n  background: #1e1e1e;\n  color: #d4d4d4;\n  caret-color: #10b981;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor:focus {\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-editor:focus {\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n/* Selection styling */\n.ontonaut-editor::selection {\n  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor::-moz-selection {\n  background: rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.3);\n}\n\n.ontonaut-editor::placeholder {\n  color: #6a737d;\n  font-style: italic;\n}\n\n/* Output Section */\n.ontonaut-output-section {\n  border-top: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n  background: #fafbfc;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output-section {\n  border-top-color: #333333;\n  background: #252525;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-output-label {\n  padding: 6px 10px;\n  font-size: 11px;\n  font-weight: 600;\n  color: #6b7280;\n  text-transform: uppercase;\n  letter-spacing: 0.8px;\n  border-bottom: 1px solid #e8eaed;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output-label {\n  color: #9ca3af;\n  border-bottom-color: #333333;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-output,\n.ontonaut-error {\n  margin: 0;\n  padding: 10px;\n  font-family: \"SF Mono\", Monaco, \"Cascadia Code\", \"Roboto Mono\", Consolas, \"Courier New\", monospace;\n  font-size: 12px;\n  line-height: 18px;\n  white-space: pre-wrap;\n  word-wrap: break-word;\n  background: white;\n  color: #1f2937;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-output {\n  background: #1a1a1a;\n  color: #e0e0e0;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-error {\n  color: #dc2626;\n  background: #fef2f2;\n  border-left: 2px solid #dc2626;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-container[data-theme=\"dark\"] .ontonaut-error {\n  color: #f87171;\n  background: #2a1a1a;\n  border-left-color: #f87171;\n}\n\n.ontonaut-error:empty {\n  display: none;\n}\n\n/* Responsive */\n@media (max-width: 768px) {\n  .ontonaut-toolbar {\n    flex-wrap: wrap;\n  }\n\n  .ontonaut-editor {\n    font-size: 12px;\n  }\n}\n"' data-buffer-paths='[]'></marimo-anywidget></marimo-ui-element>
